# Kolonia Czwarta

| subdivision_type1 = Voivodeship

Kolonia Czwarta  is a settlement in the administrative district of Gmina Krzęcin, within Choszczno County, West Pomeranian Voivodeship, in north-western Poland. It lies approximately  south-east of Krzęcin,  south-east of Choszczno, and  south-east of the regional capital Szczecin.
For the history of the region, see History of Pomerania.
